content: learn how to make a super cute snowman with this free and easy amigurumi crochet pattern materials -your choice of yarn and matching hook size i used worsted weight yarn and a 3 75mm hook -safety eyes i used 8mm -polyester fiber fill -yarn needle -pins -scissors abbreviations -magic_ring- magic_ring -increase- increase -single_crochet- single_crochet -st- stitch -decrease- decrease -flo- front loops only -blo- back loops only -fo- fasten_off/finish off -chain- chain -half_double_crochet- half_double_crochet
